Editors

  • Lucid

    Hi Ian, I see you’re interested in Lucene… Interested in reviewing LucidWorks Enterprise? It’s the search solution development platform built on the power of Apache Solr/Lucene technology, developed by the enterprise search experts at Lucid Imagination. If so, you can contact me at lucid@eastwick.com – Check it out: http://www.lucidimagination.com/developers/whitepapers/getting-started-with-lucidworks-enterprise
